sentences.english: "compare the price with several shops, it's boon like buying vegetable in the market".

sentences.english: The food market are full of fish and meat, shopping and cooking become the main activities for people.
sentences.chinese: 菜市场鱼肉满架，购物和烹调成了人们的主要活动。

sentences.english: A steep market street descends from the Mid-Levels to Sheung Wan.
sentences.chinese: 半山一个建于陡坡的菜市场，沿街伸展到上环。

sentences.english: We walked along a few blocks until we reached the market.
sentences.chinese: 我们走过了好几条街才到达菜市场。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the infection condition of sparganum of Spirometra mansoni in frogs from Guangzhou city during the last four years.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解广州市肉菜市场虎纹蛙感染裂头蚴的情况。

sentences.english: My entire monthly pension of $147 is spent on food.
sentences.chinese: 我一个月的退休金是147块美元，全用在菜市场了。

sentences.english: He said to himself that he was probably in the sewer des Halles;
sentences.chinese: 他想他大概是在菜市场的阴沟中。

sentences.english: Buy fresh fruit and homemade jam at the farmer's market.

sentences.english: Duo to the vegetable market to buy vegetables, kang to show jade get better treatment.

sentences.english: Smoke hung over the roofs in the direction of the Halles.
sentences.chinese: 菜市场那边的屋顶上冒着烟。

sentences.english: These food markets have more or less the same setup.
sentences.chinese: 几个菜市场的格局差不多。
